summary: ABS LIGHT COME ON.  ABS MOTOR BEGAN TO BUZZ AND WOULD NOT STOP WHEN THE ENGINE WAS SHUT OFF.  I HAD TO TAKE THE FUSE OUT THAT WAS FOR THE ABS BRAKES.  THE BRAKE LIGHT AND ABS LIGHT STAY ON THE DASH.  I RECENTLY HAD VALID BREAK ISSUES AND I WAS NOT ABLE TO TELL DUE TO THE STAYING ON CONTINUALLY.   *NLM
